text: @mattgaetz In your America you work despite a pandemic until you die without healthcare. Kids are thrown in filthy Covid19 ridden camps, bigotry& racism rule.The mob is white supremacists & the cops mercenaries. The GOP is corrupt & beholden to Putin's agenda. Politics of fear & desperation
